name: raagam
description: Raagam - Your personal Telugu music player. No ads, no tracking, no subscriptions.

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.demo:build: VITE_DEMO_MODE=true npm run build && mkdir -p docs/audio && cp -r music/* docs/audio/
scripts.deploy:pages: git add . && git commit -m 'Deploy to GitHub Pages' && git push
